b.	* Collaboration with others in the community, including partnering organizations, local businesses, etc
i.	This month Navigators worked with the NC Harm Reduction Coalition to table at their resource fair.
ii.	Navigators facilitated new partnerships with local Chambers of Commerce in rural NC to provide information on Marketplace coverage.
iii.	Navigators continued fostering relationships with local churches to ensure Marketplace information was distributed to congregants.
c.	* Providing targeted assistance to priority populations
i.	Navigators worked with rural individuals through community and technical colleges this month, and were able to assist with outreach, education, and enrollment services.
ii.	Navigators worked with populations impacted by Helene by partnering with organizations who are providing donations such as bedding, clothing, cleaning supplies, personal hygiene supplies.
